name: Winston Emmerson
comment: We sought systematic reviews of text messaging interventions in preventive or curative health care.

name: Noble Ranstead
comment: Computerized text-parsing tools such as LSA allow an objective review of text responses that would be otherwise impossible to standardize.

name: Shurlock Durran
comment: We sought systematic reviews of text messaging interventions in preventive or curative health care.

name: Merell Kinkaid
comment: Following a screening of the titles and abstracts, the decision about inclusion/exclusion will be based on the review of full texts and made independently by two reviewers.

name: Kirk Dumberrill
comment: The problem of opinion fraud detection has been addressed by focusing on the review of text information and by behavioral approaches that utilize the behavior of users.

name: Katie Tibbs
comment: In their products, we present a review of text compression algorithms, with particular emphasis on the LZ family algorithms, and present our current research on the family of Star compression algorithms.
